English: Huh? Who the heck're you?
Chinese: 啊……？你是誰啊？
German: Na? Wer zum Teufel bist denn du?

English:
You yankin' my chain? Showin' up here like this?
I'm gonna kick you right on outta here!
Chinese:
居然大搖大擺地出現在這種地方……瞧不起我啊！？
看我先踩扁你，再賞你一腳！
Korean:
이런 곳에 뻔뻔스럽게 기어 들어오고 말이야… 얕보는 거냐!?
짓밟아서 냅다 걷어차 버린다!?
German:
Was kreuzt du hier auf? Soll das ein Witz sein?
Ich schmeiß dich sofort raus!

English:
I've got infinite extra lives!
Whoa, wait, what? Are you with them too?
Chinese:
小心我無限1UP喔……啊？
怎麼？原來你也是同伴喔～
Korean:
영원히 보내 버리는 수가 있다… 아앙?
…뭐야, 너도 동료였잖아~
German:
Ich habe unendlich viele Extraleben!
Boah, he, Moment! Gehörst du auch zu denen?

English: A newbie? Did you raid someone's account?
Chinese: 新人嗎？有沒有乖乖去狩獵帳號啊？
German: Ein Noob? Hast du einen Account geklaut?

English: Well, excellent! Next time, let's raid together!
Chinese: 喔～還挺厲害的嘛！那下次要不要跟我一起去狩獵啊～
Korean: 헤에~ 꽤 하잖아~? 다음 번에, 나랑 사냥 한번 가자고~
German:
Na, hervorragend! Nächstes Mal gehen wir
gemeinsam auf Raubzug!

English: You promise?
Chinese: 約好了喔～
German: Versprochen?

English: You came at a good time. You with me?
Chinese: 話說，你來的真是時候……在那邊唷！
German: Du kommst zur rechten Zeit. Bist du dabei?

English: Have a look over there.
Chinese: 你看那邊！
German: Schau mal da rüber.

English: That's Mephisto.
Chinese: 那位就是「梅菲斯特先生」！
German: Das ist Mephisto.

English:
Mephisto buys any hijacked accounts from us
directly.
Chinese:
盜取來的帳號，
都可以直接賣給那個人。
Korean:
강탈한 계정은
저 사람이 직접, 매입해 주거든
German: Mephisto kauft uns geknackte Accounts direkt ab.

English:
What, you're off already?
Mephisto's a little crazy, so be careful!
Chinese:
啊，你要走了嗎！？
他精神狀態有點不正常，你自己小心唷～！
Korean:
아, 벌써 가는 거냐!?
좀 맛이 간 사람이니까, 조심하라고~!
German:
Wie, du willst gleich hin?
Mephisto ist ein bisschen irre, also Vorsicht!

English: Hand. Over. Accounts. Now.
Chinese: 給……我……帳號……快點……給我……。
German: Accounts. Her. Sofort.

English: Uugh. Accounts. Accounts.
Chinese: 唔唔……帳號……帳號……。
German: Hrmm. Accounts. Accounts.

English:
I want to ask about account raids.
Is that okay?
Chinese:
我想問你關於帳號狩獵的事。
你、你沒事吧？
Korean:
계정 사냥에 대해 묻고 싶어
괘, 괜찮으세요?
German:
Ich möchte etwas über gestohlene Accounts fragen.
Geht das?

English:
Accounts. Now.
Hand. Over. Accounts!
Chinese:
快……快點……給我帳號……！
給我……帳……帳號！
German:
Accounts. Sofort.
Her. Mit den. Accounts!

English:
Acc...?
Aghahbababababa...
Chinese:
帳……號……？
你……你你你你你你……你你……
German:
Acc ...?
Arghhh ...

English: Babababababawow-wow!
Chinese: 你……你你你你……你你你啊啊！
German: Babababababawau-wau!

English:
Whoa! What did you do to him?
Mephisto, are you rollin'?
Chinese:
喂……你對梅菲斯特先生做了什麼？
梅菲斯特先生越來越不正常了！
Korean:
잠깐… 너, 메피스토씨에게 대체 뭘 한 거야!?
메피스토씨, 완전히 맛이 가 버렸잖아!?
German:
Woah! Was hast du denn mit ihm gemacht?
Mephisto, alles klar?

English:
Y-Y-You, you didn't bring iiiiiiit!
S-S-So, so, give me your account!
Chinese:
你你你……你說你沒拿帳號來啊啊啊啊啊啊！
那……那那那……把你的……帳號……拿來！
Korean:
가가가, 가져오지 않았다고오오오오오으아아아아!
그, 그그그렇다면… 너, 의 계, 정을 내놔아아아!!
German:
D-D-Du hast mir nichts gebraaacht!
A-A-Also her mit deinem Account!

English:
Hey, calm down, Mephisto!
Look, you're freakin' the newbie out!
Chinese:
請、請冷靜一點！「梅菲斯特先生」先生！?
你看，新人會嚇到的……「梅菲斯特先生」先生！？
Korean:
지, 진정해 주세요,「메피스토씨」씨!?
봐요, 신입이 겁내고 있잖아요…「메피스토씨」씨!?
German:
He, beruhig dich mal, Mephisto!
Schau doch, du machst dem Newbie Angst!

English: Aaaoww!
Chinese: 唔啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！
German: Huaaargh!

English: I want a rare... sparkling, shiny new account...
Chinese: 給我……亮晶晶的乾淨帳號……
Korean: 나에게 레어한… 반짝반짝 빛나는 아름다운 계정을…
German:
Ich will einen seltenen ... schicken neuen
Account ...

English: Give it to meeeeee!
Chinese: 給我拿來啊啊啊啊！！！
German: Heeeeeer damit!
